FS10000.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
FS10000.application_notes: Flow/No-flow detection. Max 24" probe length recommended.

LS2000.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS2000.application_notes: Limited static protection. 24VDC option at no extra charge. 12VDC and 240VAC not available.

LS2100.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS2100.application_notes: Loop powered switch operates between 8mA and 16mA. 16-32 VDC operating range.

LS6000.housing_type: Explosion Proof Class I, Groups C & D
LS6000.application_notes: Delrin insulators standard for SS probes. 3/4" NPT optional at no charge.

LS7000.housing_type: NEMA 7, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS7000.application_notes: On board timer available. 3/4" NPT optional at no charge.

LS7000/2.housing_type: NEMA 7, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS7000/2.application_notes: Auto fill/empty only. Must use Halar probe in conductive liquids.

LS7500.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS7500.application_notes: Replacement for Princo L3515. Flange mounted.

LS8000.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS8000.application_notes: Remote mounted system with transmitter/receiver. Multiple sensitivities available.

LS8000/2.description: LS8000/2 Remote Mounted Dual Point Switch
LS8000/2.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS8000/2.application_notes: Remote dual point system. Extra transmitter available.

LS8500.housing_type: NEMA 7, C, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LS8500.application_notes: Replacement for Princo L3545. Flange mounted.

LT9000.housing_type: NEMA 7, D; NEMA 9, E, F, G
LT9000.application_notes: For electrically conductive liquids. Must be grounded to fluid.
